Then said<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> unto me, Go<S>3212</S> yet, love<S>157</S> a woman<S>802</S> beloved<S>157</S> of her friend<S>7453</S>, yet an adulteress<S>5003</S>, according to the love<S>160</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> toward the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, who look<S>6437</S> to other<S>312</S> gods<S>430</S>, and love<S>157</S> flagons<S>809</S> of wine<S>6025</S>. <sup>of wine: Heb. of grapes</sup>
So I bought<S>3739</S> her to me for fifteen<S>6240</S> <S>2568</S> pieces of silver<S>3701</S>, and for an homer<S>2563</S> of barley<S>8184</S>, and an half homer<S>3963</S> of barley<S>8184</S>: <sup>half: Heb. lethech</sup>
And I said<S>559</S> unto her, Thou shalt abide<S>3427</S> for me many<S>7227</S> days<S>3117</S>; thou shalt not play the harlot<S>2181</S>, and thou shalt not be<S>1961</S> for another man<S>376</S>: so will I also be for thee.
For the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> shall abide<S>3427</S> many<S>7227</S> days<S>3117</S> without a king<S>4428</S>, and without a prince<S>8269</S>, and without a sacrifice<S>2077</S>, and without an image<S>4676</S>, and without an ephod<S>646</S>, and without teraphim<S>8655</S>: <sup>image: Heb. a standing, or, statue, or, pillar</sup>
Afterward<S>310</S> shall the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> return<S>7725</S>, and seek<S>1245</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> their God<S>430</S>, and David<S>1732</S> their king<S>4428</S>; and shall fear<S>6342</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> and his goodness<S>2898</S> in the latter<S>319</S> days<S>3117</S>.
